title: Introduction
description: What is Astro Blog and why should you use it?
content:
Introduction

Astro Blog is a modern blog system built for developers and content creators who want a fast, beautiful, and feature-rich blogging experience.

What is Astro Blog?

Astro Blog is built on top of Astro, a modern static site generator. It combines:
Astro - For blazing fast static site generation
Vue 3 - For interactive components
Tailwind CSS - For beautiful, responsive styling

::: tip Static Site Generation
Your blog is pre-built as static HTML files, meaning:
Instant page loads - No server processing needed
Better SEO - Search engines love static content
Easy hosting - Deploy anywhere (Vercel, Netlify, GitHub Pages)
:::

Key Features

Writing Features

| Feature | Description |
|---------|-------------|
| Markdown/MDX | Write in Markdown with component support |
| Code Highlighting | Beautiful syntax highlighting for 100+ languages |
| Math Formulas | LaTeX math with KaTeX |
| Diagrams | Flowcharts and diagrams with Mermaid |
| Containers | Callouts, tips, warnings, and more |
| Videos | Embed YouTube, Bilibili, or self-hosted videos |

System Features

| Feature | Description |
|---------|-------------|
| Dark Mode | Toggle between light and dark themes |
| Responsive | Perfect on desktop, tablet, and mobile |
| Search | Full-text search across all posts |
| RSS Feed | Auto-generated RSS for subscribers |
| SEO | Optimized meta tags and sitemap |
| i18n | Multi-language support |

When to Use Astro Blog?

Astro Blog is perfect for:

::: info Good Use Cases
Tech blogs - Share tutorials and technical knowledge
Personal blogs - Document your journey and thoughts
Documentation - Create product or project docs
Portfolios - Showcase your work with blog posts
:::

Tech Stack

::: details View Full Stack
Framework: Astro v5.x
UI Components: Vue 3
Styling: Tailwind CSS v4.x
Code Highlighting: Shiki
Math: KaTeX
Diagrams: Mermaid
Icons: Font Awesome, Material Icons, Remix Icon, Bootstrap Icons
:::

Ready to set up your blog? Continue to Installation.

content:
LaTeX Math

Write beautiful mathematical formulas using LaTeX syntax, rendered with KaTeX.

Inline Math

Use single  for inline formulas:

The famous equation $E = mc^2$ changed physics.

More examples:
Area of circle: $A = \pi r^2$
Pythagorean theorem: $a^2 + b^2 = c^2$
Quadratic formula: $x = \frac{-b \pm \sqrt{b^2-4ac}}{2a}$

Block Math

Use double  for centered, block-level formulas:

$$
\int0^\infty e^{-x^2} dx = \frac{\sqrt{\pi}}{2}
$$

Basic Syntax

Superscripts and Subscripts

| Syntax | Result |
|--------|--------|
|  | $x^2$ |
|  | $xi$ |
|  | $xi^2$ |
|  | $x^{10}$ |

Fractions

$$
\frac{a}{b} \quad \frac{1}{2} \quad \frac{x+1}{y-1}
$$

Square Roots

$$
\sqrt{2} \quad \sqrt{x+y} \quad \sqrt[3]{8}
$$

Greek Letters

| Letter | Syntax | Letter | Syntax |
|--------|--------|--------|--------|
| $\alpha$ |  | $\beta$ |  |
| $\gamma$ |  | $\delta$ |  |
| $\pi$ |  | $\sigma$ |  |
| $\theta$ |  | $\lambda$ |  |
| $\Omega$ |  | $\Sigma$ |  |

Operators

Sums and Products

$$
\sum{i=1}^{n} xi \quad \prod{i=1}^{n} xi
$$

Integrals

$$
\inta^b f(x)dx \quad \iintD f(x,y)dxdy \quad \ointC f(z)dz
$$

Limits

$$
\lim{x \to \infty} \frac{1}{x} = 0
$$

Matrices

$$
\begin{pmatrix}
a & b \\
c & d
\end{pmatrix}
\quad
\begin{bmatrix}
1 & 2 & 3 \\
4 & 5 & 6
\end{bmatrix}
$$

Equations

Aligned Equations

$$
\begin{aligned}
(a+b)^2 &= a^2 + 2ab + b^2 \\
(a-b)^2 &= a^2 - 2ab + b^2
\end{aligned}
$$

Cases

$$
f(x) = \begin{cases}
x^2 & \text{if } x \geq 0 \\
-x^2 & \text{if } x < 0
\end{cases}
$$

Common Formulas

Statistics

Standard deviation:
$$
\sigma = \sqrt{\frac{1}{N}\sum{i=1}^{N}(xi - \mu)^2}
$$

Calculus

Taylor series:
$$
e^x = \sum{n=0}^{\infty} \frac{x^n}{n!} = 1 + x + \frac{x^2}{2!} + \frac{x^3}{3!} + \cdots
$$

Physics

Maxwell's equations:
$$
\nabla \cdot \mathbf{E} = \frac{\rho}{\varepsilon_0}
$$

Tips

::: tip Best Practices
Use inline math for simple formulas in text
Use block math for complex or important equations
Add spacing with  between elements
Test rendering - KaTeX doesn't support all LaTeX
:::

::: info Reference
Full KaTeX syntax: katex.org/docs/supported.html
:::

title: 介绍
description: 什么是 Astro 博客？为什么要使用它？
content:
介绍

Astro 博客是一个为开发者和内容创作者打造的现代博客系统，提供快速、美观且功能丰富的写作体验。

什么是 Astro 博客？

Astro 博客基于 Astro 构建，这是一个现代静态站点生成器。它结合了：
Astro - 闪电般快速的静态站点生成
Vue 3 - 用于交互组件
Tailwind CSS - 美观、响应式的样式

::: tip 静态站点生成
你的博客被预先构建为静态 HTML 文件，这意味着：
即时页面加载 - 无需服务器处理
更好的 SEO - 搜索引擎喜欢静态内容
易于托管 - 可部署到任何地方（Vercel、Netlify、GitHub Pages）
:::

核心特性

写作功能

| 特性 | 描述 |
|------|------|
| Markdown/MDX | 使用 Markdown 写作，支持组件 |
| 代码高亮 | 100+ 种语言的精美语法高亮 |
| 数学公式 | 使用 KaTeX 渲染 LaTeX 数学公式 |
| 图表 | 使用 Mermaid 绘制流程图和图表 |
| 容器 | 标注、提示、警告等 |
| 视频 | 嵌入 YouTube、Bilibili 或自托管视频 |

系统功能

| 特性 | 描述 |
|------|------|
| 深色模式 | 切换浅色和深色主题 |
| 响应式 | 完美适配桌面、平板和手机 |
| 搜索 | 全文搜索所有文章 |
| RSS 订阅 | 自动生成 RSS 供订阅者使用 |
| SEO | 优化的 meta 标签和站点地图 |
| 多语言 | 多语言支持 |

何时使用 Astro 博客？

Astro 博客非常适合：

::: info 适用场景
技术博客 - 分享教程和技术知识
个人博客 - 记录你的旅程和想法
文档站点 - 创建产品或项目文档
作品集 - 展示你的作品
:::

技术栈

::: details 查看完整技术栈
框架: Astro v5.x
UI 组件: Vue 3
样式: Tailwind CSS v4.x
代码高亮: Shiki
数学: KaTeX
图表: Mermaid
图标: Font Awesome、Material Icons、Remix Icon、Bootstrap Icons
:::

准备好设置你的博客了吗？继续阅读 安装。
